message: Did you know? Holding shift on a marker will show its coordinates.
Did you know? You can change the volume of the earplug with the 'PageUp' and 'PageDown' keys.
Did you know? DayZ Expansion released the 1st of June, 2020.
Did you know? You can change the party member icon in your options!
Did you know? Helicopters can also tow vehicles.
Did you know? Ramming a tree will make it fall.
Did you know? DayZ Expansion is translated in 13 languages.
Did you know? DayZ Expansion added 82 flags.
Did you know? Bunnies sound like chickens! Strange, isn't it?
Did you know? You can store 24 firearms in the gunrack.
Did you know? 50% of facts in this section are made up. Including this one.
Did you know? You can change the size of the chat in your options!
Did you know? You can toggle helicopter autohover with the default key 'X'.
Did you know? If you have a working GPS, hold N to toggle it and tap N to switch mode.
Did you know? You can hide the chat with the divide key '/'.
